response.subtask:
(1) Move the robot to the mug.
(2) Grasp the mug.
(3) Move the robot to the sink.
(4) Put the mug inside the sink.
(5) Move the robot to the bowl.
(6) Grasp the bowl.
(7) Move the robot to the sink.
(8) Put the bowl inside the sink.
